inclusion.criterion: admitted to intensive care unit of Assiut University Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms of systemic infection and with a clinical suspicion of sepsis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: as guided by the ICU physician
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who received antibiotic therapy within three days prior to sample collection

notes: 25-year-old G1 P1 pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and flank pain.
